data.lyric:
[ti:Young For You]
[ar:GALA]
[al:Young For You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Young For You (为你年轻) - GALA
[00:11.98]Lyrics by：苏朵
[00:23.96]Composed by：苏朵
[00:35.94]Sunday's coming I wanna drive my car
[00:39.25]To your apartment with a present like a star
[00:43.25]Forecaster said the weathers may be rainy hard
[00:47.19]But I know the sun will shine for us
[00:50.87]
[00:51.72]Oh lazy seagull fly me from the dark
[00:55.21]I dress my jeans and feed my monkey banana
[00:59.21]Then I think my age how old skyline how far
[01:03.78]We need each other in California
[01:07.79]You show me your body before night comes down
[01:11.74]I touch your face and promise to stay ever young
[01:15.82]On this ivory beach we kissed so long
[01:19.77]It seems that the passion's never gone
[01:22.95]
[01:23.78]You sing me your melody and I feel so please
[01:27.85]I want you to want me to keep your dream
[01:31.75]Together we'll run wild by a summer symphony
[01:35.92]This is what we enjoyed not fantasy
[01:41.92]
[01:55.70]The tin-man's surfing I wanna try my luck
[01:59.20]To the top of tide rip like just have some d**gs
[02:03.25]I know you have no blame for my proud moonish heart
[02:07.25]Welcome to the golden beatnik park
[02:11.81]Oh diamond seashore drag me from the yard
[02:15.24]Incredible sunward I watch as you're in photograph
[02:19.22]For camera your smile's so sweet palm trees' so lush
[02:23.74]Would you believe my honey it's California
[02:27.72]You show me your body before night comes down
[02:31.73]I touch your face and promise to stay ever young
[02:35.75]On this ivory beach we kissed so long
[02:39.77]It seems that the passion's never gone
[02:43.69]You sing me your melody and I feel so please
[02:47.72]I want you to want me to keep your dream
[02:51.71]Together we'll run wild by a summer symphony
[02:55.96]This is what we enjoyed not fantasy
data.trans:
[ti:Young For You]
[ar:GALA]
[al:Young For You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:11.98]//
[00:23.96]//
[00:35.94]星期天啊 我想开着我的座驾
[00:39.25]像大明星一样带着礼物来到你家
[00:43.25]天气预报说今天可能雨很大
[00:47.19]但我坚信阳光会为你我而闪耀 
[00:50.87]
[00:51.72]黄昏中飞来一只慵懒的海鸟
[00:55.21]我穿上牛仔裤 给猴哥喂一点儿香蕉
[00:59.21]然后思考 我有多大 天有多高
[01:03.78]在加利福尼亚我们需要彼此
[01:07.79]夜晚来临之前 你向我展示妖娆的身段
[01:11.74]我轻抚你的脸颊 承诺永远青春 
[01:15.82]在象牙色的海滩我们拥吻不断
[01:19.77]仿佛这份激情永不消逝
[01:22.95]
[01:23.78]你对我哼着小曲儿 感觉如此惬意
[01:27.85]我渴望你也心想着要我守护你的梦
[01:31.75]在夏季的交响乐里 我们撒欢儿淘气
[01:35.92]这是真实的喜悦而非梦幻
[01:41.92]
[01:55.70]看他们冲浪 我也想玩一把
[01:59.20]直冲浪尖的感觉如同**
[02:03.25]我知道你不怪我抓狂又特别孤傲
[02:07.25]欢迎来到比特尼克一代的黄金花园 
[02:11.81]钻石般海滩将我拉离花园 
[02:15.24]阳光下的画卷 你竟融化在我眼前
[02:19.22]你对镜头笑很甜 棕榈树那样青葱 
[02:23.74]亲爱的 这就是加州 你信吗
[02:27.72]夜晚来临之前 你向我展示妖娆的身段
[02:31.73]我轻抚你的脸颊 承诺永远青春 
[02:35.75]在象牙色的海滩我们拥吻不断
[02:39.77]仿佛这份激情永不消逝
[02:43.69]你对我哼着小曲儿 感觉如此惬意
[02:47.72]我渴望你也心想着要我守护你的梦
[02:51.71]在夏季的交响乐里 我们撒欢儿淘气
[02:55.96]这是真实的喜悦而非梦幻
